mapper.sql: SELECT A.rsnm, A.iboard ,(SELECT count(*) from t_matzip_fav where iboard=#{iboard} and iuser = #{iuser}) as isFav FROM t_matzip A
mapper.select: SELECT * (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_matzip_fav WHERE iboard = #{iboard}) as favCnt FROM t_mapzip WHERE iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_matzip ( iboard, rsnm, rsc, rsad, rstel ) VALUES ( #{iboard}, #{rsnm}, #{rsc}, #{rsad}, #{rstel} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, COUNT(A.icmt) - 1 AS isMore FROM ( SELECT A.icmt, A.cmt, A.regdate, A.iboard , B.iuser, B.nm as writer, B.mainProfile as writerProfile FROM t_matzip_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.ifeed = ${ifeed} ORDER BY icmt ASC LIMIT 2 ) A GROUP BY A.iboard

SELECT A.icmt, A.cmt, A.regdate , B.iuser, B.nm as writer, B.mainProfile as writerProfile FROM t_matzip_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = ${iboard} ORDER BY icmt ASC LIMIT 1, 900000
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_matzip_cmt ( iboard, iuser, cmt ) VALUES ( ${iboard}, ${iuser}, #{cmt} )
